languages.text:
The Death Cult assassin's next single-target melee attack splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. The Death Cult assassin and their allies in the affected area gain the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodblessed{/g} effect. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 rounds. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.
Additionally, for every 10 wounds the Death Cult assassin loses throughout the entire combat, each affected creature receives +1 stack of the corresponding effect.

languages.original_text:
Next single-target melee attack of Death Cult Assassin splashes units in area behind the attacked one with the blood and leaves pool of blood on the floor for 2 turns. All units covered with blood or making contact with the blood pool gain Bloodstained status for 2 turns.
Bloodstained allies deal 2+AB/2% more Damage for each stack of the effect.
Bloodstained enemies receive 2+AB/2% more Damage for each stack of the effect.
Additionally, each time Death Cult Assassin loses 10 Wounds, all Bloodstained units gain +1 stack of the effect.

traits.locale_text:
The Death Cult assassin's next single-target melee attack splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. The Death Cult assassin and their allies in the affected area gain the bloodblessed effect. Every enemy in this area including the initial target suffers the bloodstained effect. Both effects last for 2 rounds. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the bloodblessed or bloodstained effect accordingly.
A creature under the bloodblessed effect deals +<u>(2 + Agility bonus / 2)</u>% more damage for each stack of the effect.
A creature under the bloodstained effect suffers +<u>(2 + Agility bonus / 2)</u>% more damage for each stack of the effect.
Additionally, for every 10 wounds the Death Cult assassin loses throughout the entire combat, each affected creature receives +1 stack of the corresponding effect.

Additionally, for every 10 wounds the Death Cult assassin loses throughout the entire combat, each affected creature receives +1 stack of the corresponding effect.

languages.text:
El siguiente ataque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de un objetivo del {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} salpica sangre en un cono de 5 casillas detrás del objetivo. El {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} y sus aliados en el área de efecto ganan el efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g}. Todos los enemigos en el área, incluyendo el objetivo inicial, sufren el efecto {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Ambos efectos duran 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Además, todas las casillas del área afectada quedan cubiertas de sangre durante 2 asaltos. Cuando una criatura interactúa con una de estas casillas (al moverse a ella o estar en ella al aplicarse el efecto), recibe +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g} o {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}, según corresponda.
Además, por cada 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que el {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} pierda durante el combate, cada criatura afectada por {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g} o {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g} gana +1 acumulación del efecto correspondiente.

El siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} del Culto de la Muerte salpica sangre en un cono de 5 casillas detrás del objetivo. El asesino del Culto de la Muerte y sus aliados en el área de efecto ganan el efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g}. Todos los enemigos en el área, incluyendo el objetivo inicial, sufren el efecto {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}. Ambos efectos duran 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Además, todas las casillas del área afectada quedan cubiertas de sangre durante 2 asaltos. Cuando una criatura interactúa con una de estas casillas (al moverse a ella o estar en ella al aplicarse el efecto), recibe +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g} o {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}, según corresponda.
Además, por cada 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que el asesino del Culto de la Muerte pierda durante el combate, cada criatura afectada gana +1 acumulación del efecto correspondiente.

El {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} y sus aliados en el área de efecto ganan el efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g}. Además, todas las casillas del área afectada quedan cubiertas de sangre durante 2 asaltos. Cuando una criatura interactúa con una de estas casillas (al moverse a ella o estar en ella al aplicarse el efecto), recibe +1 acumulación del efecto {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bendecidos por la sangre{/g} o {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}mancha de sangre{/g}, según corresponda.
Además, por cada 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} que el {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} pierda durante el combate, cada criatura afectada gana +1 acumulación del efecto correspondiente.

languages.text:
{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}の次のシングルターゲット{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}はターゲットの後方に扇状に5セル分血をまき散らす。影響エリア内にいる{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}とその味方は{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}効果を得る。当初のターゲットを含むこのエリア内にいるすべての敵は、{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血塗れ{/g}効果を得る。どちらの効果も2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}継続する。さらに、影響エリアないのすべてのセルは、2ラウンドの間、血に覆われる。生物がそのようなセルとインタラクトする（そこに移動するまたは効果適用時にそこに立つ）たび、受ける効果に応じて{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血塗れ{/g}効果を追加で+1スタック受け取る。
さらに、戦闘全体を通して{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を10失うごとに、{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血塗れ{/g}に影響を受けている生物は、対応する効果を+1スタック受け取る。
languages.original_text:

The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} and allies in the affected area gain the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.

さらに、戦闘全体を通して{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を10失うごとに、ブラッドブレスドまたは血塗れに影響を受けている生物は、対応する効果を+1スタック受け取る。

デスカルト・{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}の次のシングルターゲット{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}はターゲットの後方に扇状に5セル分血をまき散らす。影響エリア内にいるデスカルト・アサシンとその味方は{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}効果を得る。当初のターゲットを含むこのエリア内にいるすべての敵は、{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血塗れ{/g}効果を得る。どちらの効果も2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}継続する。さらに、影響エリアないのすべてのセルは、2ラウンドの間、血に覆われる。生物がそのようなセルとインタラクトする（そこに移動するまたは効果適用時にそこに立つ）たび、受ける効果に応じて{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}ブラッドブレスド{/g}または{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血塗れ{/g}効果を追加で+1スタック受け取る。
さらに、戦闘全体を通してデスカルト・アサシンが{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を10失うごとに、影響を受けている生物は、対応する効果を+1スタック受け取る。

languages.text:
{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}下次进行单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，会让目标身后扇形区域5格内所有生物溅上血迹。{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}与受影响的盟友获得{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，而区域内的所有敌人，包括最初攻击的目标，都会受到{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果影响，两种效果各持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，受影响的区域会被鲜血覆盖，持续两轮。每当任何生物与鲜血地块进行互动时（效果生效时身处地块之中，或移动至地块上），该生物都会相应额外获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}或{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。
此外，在整场战斗中，每当{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}失去10点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，所有受{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}或{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果影响的生物都会额外获得1层相应的效果。
languages.original_text:
The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}'s next single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} and allies in the affected area gain the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.
Additionally, for every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} the {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} loses throughout the entire combat, each creature affected by {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} gains +1 stack of the corresponding effect.

{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}下次进行单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，会让目标身后扇形区域5格内所有生物溅上血迹。{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}与受影响的盟友获得{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，而区域内的所有敌人，包括最初攻击的目标，都会受到{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果影响，两种效果各持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，受影响的区域会被鲜血覆盖，持续两轮。每当任何生物与鲜血地块进行互动时（效果生效时身处地块之中，或移动至地块上），该生物都会相应额外获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}或{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。
此外，在整场战斗中，每当{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}失去10点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，所有受影响的生物都会额外获得1层相应的效果。

{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}下次进行单体{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，会让目标身后扇形区域5格内区域溅上血迹。{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}与受影响的盟友获得{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}效果，而区域内的所有敌人，包括最初攻击的目标，都会受到{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果影响，两种效果各持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此外，受影响的区域会被鲜血覆盖，持续两轮。每当任何生物与鲜血地块进行互动时（效果生效时身处地块之中，或移动至地块上），该生物都会相应额外获得1层{g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}血佑{/g}或{g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}血染{/g}效果。
此外，在整场战斗中，每当{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}失去10点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}时，所有受“血佑”或“血染”效果影响的生物都会额外获得1层相应的效果。

languages.text:
Der nächste {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf-Angriff{/g} des {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassinen{/g} vergießt Blut in einem 5 Zellen umfassenden Kegel hinter dem Ziel. Der {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} und seine Verbündeten im betroffenen Bereich erhalten den {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}-Effekt. Jeder Gegner in diesem Bereich (das ursprüngliche Ziel eingeschlossen) wird mit dem {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}-Effekt belegt. Beide Effekte dauern 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang an. Außerdem sind alle Zellen des betroffenen Bereichs 2 Runden lang mit Blut bedeckt. Wenn eine Kreatur mit einer solchen Zelle interagiert (indem sie diese betritt oder darauf steht, wenn der Effekt einsetzt), erhält sie +1 Stapel des {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}- oder {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}Effektes.
Für jeweils 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die der {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} während des gesamten Kampfes verliert, erhalten alle mit {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g} oder {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g} belegten Kreaturen +1 Stapel des entsprechenden Effektes.
languages.original_text:
The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}'s next single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} and allies in the affected area gain the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.

Der {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} und seine Verbündeten im betroffenen Bereich erhalten den {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}-Effekt. Beide Effekte dauern 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang an. Außerdem sind alle Zellen des betroffenen Bereichs 2 Runden lang mit Blut bedeckt. Wenn eine Kreatur mit einer solchen Zelle interagiert (indem sie diese betritt oder darauf steht, wenn der Effekt einsetzt), erhält sie +1 Stapel des {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Blutsegen{/g}- oder {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Blutbefleckt{/g}Effektes.
Für jeweils 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die der {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassine{/g} während des gesamten Kampfes verliert, erhalten alle mit "Blutsegen" oder "Blutbefleckt" belegten Kreaturen +1 Stapel des entsprechenden Effektes.

languages.text:
La prochaine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} à cible unique de l'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} projette du sang dans un cône de 5 cases derrière la cible. L'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} et ses alliés situés dans la zone affectée gagnent l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}, tandis que les ennemis (y compris la cible initiale) subissent l'effet {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les effets durent 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Les cases de la zone affectée restent couvertes de sang pendant 2 rounds. Si une créature se trouve sur une case affectée ou y pénètre une fois l'effet appliqué, elle reçoit 1 cumul supplémentaire de l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}.
De plus, toutes les 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} subies par l'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} au combat, chaque créature affectée par {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} reçoit +1 cumul de l'effet correspondant.
languages.original_text:
The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}'s next single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.

Si une créature se trouve sur une case affectée ou y pénètre une fois l'effet appliqué, elle reçoit 1 cumul supplémentaire de l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}.
De plus, toutes les 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} subies par l'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} au combat, chaque créature affectée par {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g} reçoit +1 cumul de l'effet correspondant.

La prochaine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} à cible unique de l'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} projette du sang dans un cône de 5 cases derrière la cible. L'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} et ses alliés situés dans la zone affectée gagnent l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g}, tandis que les ennemis (y compris la cible initiale) subissent l'effet {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}. Les effets durent 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Les cases de la zone affectée restent couvertes de sang pendant 2 rounds. Si une créature se trouve sur une case affectée ou y pénètre une fois l'effet appliqué, elle subit 1 cumul supplémentaire de l'effet {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}Béni par le sang{/g} ou {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}Taché de sang{/g}.
De plus, pour toutes les 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} subies par l'{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}assassin du culte de la mort{/g} au combat, chaque créature affectée par Béni par le sang ou Taché de sang reçoit +1 cumul de l'effet correspondant.

languages.text:
В результате следующей одиночной атаки {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасина культа смерти{/g} в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} из его цели вырывается струя крови, заливая пол позади этой цели в конусе (5 клеток). Сам ассасин и его союзники в этой области получают эффект {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряное благословение{/g}. Все противники в этой области, включая основную цель, получают эффект {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряный приговор{/g}. Эти эффекты длятся 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Все клетки в области действия также оказываются залиты кровью на 2 раунда. Когда любое существо взаимодействует с такой клеткой (перемещается на нее или находится там в момент применения эффекта), оно получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} или {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}.
Кроме того, за каждые 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, которые {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасин культа смерти{/g} теряет в течение боя, все существа с этими эффектами получают еще +1 уровень соответствующего эффекта.
languages.original_text:
The Death Cult {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassin{/g}'s next single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. The Death Cult assassin and their allies in the affected area gain the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.
Additionally, for every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} the Death Cult assassin loses throughout the entire combat, each affected creature receives +1 stack of the corresponding effect.

Сам ассасин и его союзники в этой области получают эффект {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряное благословение{/g}. Кроме того, за каждые 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, которые ассасин теряет в течение боя, все существа с этими эффектами получают еще +1 уровень соответствующего эффекта.

В результате следующей одиночной атаки {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасина{/g} культа смерти в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} из его цели вырывается струя крови, заливая пол позади этой цели в конусе (5 клеток). Сам ассасин и его союзники в этой области получают эффект {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряное благословение{/g}. Все противники в этой области, включая основную цель, получают эффект {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряный приговор{/g}. Эти эффекты длятся 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Все клетки в области действия также оказываются залиты кровью на 2 раунда. Когда любое существо взаимодействует с такой клеткой (перемещается на нее или находится там в момент применения эффекта), оно получает +1 уровень {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}багряного благословения{/g} или {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}багряного приговора{/g}.
Кроме того, за каждые 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, которые ассасин теряет в течение боя, все существа с этими эффектами получают еще +1 уровень соответствующего эффекта.

languages.text:
{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçısının{/g} bir sonraki tek hedefli {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g}, hedefin arkasındaki 5 hücrelik konik bir alana kan sıçratır. {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçısı{/g} ve etkilenen alandaki dost birimler, {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} etkisi kazanır. Asıl hedef de dâhil olmak üzere bu alandaki tüm düşmanlar, {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} etkisine maruz kalırlar. İki etki de 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Ek olarak, etkilenen alandaki tüm hücreler kanla kaplanır ve bu kan 2 raunt boyunca kalır. Bir yaratık bu hücrelerden biriyle etkileşime girerse (oraya hareket ederse veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duruyorsa) duruma göre ilave +1 {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} veya {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarası{/g} etkisi alır.
Ayrıca {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçısının{/g} tüm çatışma boyunca kaybettiği her 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı için, {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}kanla vaftiz{/g} veya {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}kan yarasından{/g} etkilenen yaratıkların her biri ilgili etkiden +1 birikim elde eder.
languages.original_text:
The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}'s next single-target {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} splashes blood in a 5-cell cone behind the target. The {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} and allies in the affected area gain the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} effect. Every enemy in this area, including the initial target, suffers the {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect. Both effects last for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Additionally, all the cells in the affected area are now covered in blood for 2 rounds. Whenever a creature interacts with such a cell (moves there or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied), it receives an additional +1 stack of the {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} effect accordingly.
Additionally, for every 10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} the {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g} loses throughout the entire combat, each creature affected by {g|f:437c7a78578c4bbeab1e85ea4a76df7d}bloodblessed{/g} or {g|f:4fe436747a7849759de6b83cdc774b7e}bloodstained{/g} gains +1 stack of the corresponding effect.
